register.heading: Sign up for Nexa
register.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Log in
register.successAlertDescription: A confirmation email has been sent to your address. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder.
register.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating your account

resetPassword.heading: Reset password
resetPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Sign in
resetPassword.emailDescription: The email you entered during registration
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: We have sent a password reset link to your email. If you have Telegram notifications enabled, the link has also been sent there

newPassword.heading: New Password
newPassword.backButtonLabel: Already have an account? Log in
newPassword.passwordDescription: The password you entered during registration
newPassword.passwordRepeatDescription: Repeat your new password to confirm
newPassword.errorMessage: Error while setting the new password

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Here you can manage your settings

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Set up your profile, update your avatar, change your bio, and add links to social networks to make your page more attractive to other users.

avatar.heading: Profile Image

confirmModal.heading: Remove avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to remove your profile image? This action cannot be undone

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, JPEG, PNG, WEBP or GIF. Max size: 10 MB
